message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am eager to explore a transaction. I propose to sell the product to you for $1,350,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between the intrinsic value of the product and your perceived valuation, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. Should you decide to proceed, I am confident this acquisition will be a significant addition to your collection or business. Looking forward to your positive response.
